name: Ice Island
overview: A one or two player SEUCK based Shoot'em Up created by Jim Butterfield included simultaneous co-operative play. Ride your motorized ski-bike around shooting the rival ice tribesmen, the zeppelins, balloons and other hazards. Watch out for lurkers in the tents, they will make your life in-tents! Dodge bears and bats and penguins all with a taste for snowcones of blood!
